H0.text: In Rome, who formed the 'First Triumvirate' with Julius Caesar and Crassus. Cicero

H1.text: In Rome, who formed the 'First Triumvirate' with Julius Caesar and Crassus. Mark Antony

H2.text: In Rome, who formed the 'First Triumvirate' with Julius Caesar and Crassus. Brutus

H3.text: In Rome, who formed the 'First Triumvirate' with Julius Caesar and Crassus. POMPEY

A4.text: The First Triumvirate (c. late 60 – 53 BC) was an informal political alliance among three prominent politicians in the late Roman Republic: Gnaeus Pompeius Magnus, Marcus Licinius Crassus, and Gaius Julius Caesar.
